1: רָאִ֨יתִי <sup>7200 </sup> <n>I saw</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> אֲדֹנָ֜י <sup>136 </sup> <n>the Lord</n> נִצָּ֣ב <sup>5324 </sup> <n>standing</n> עַֽל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>beside</n> הַמִּזְבֵּ֗חַ <sup>4196 </sup> <n>upon the altar</n> וַיֹּאמֶר֩ <sup>559 </sup> <n>and he said</n> הַ֨ךְ <sup>5221 </sup> <n>Smite</n> הַכַּפְתּ֜וֹר <sup>3730 </sup> <n>the lintel of the door</n> וְיִרְעֲשׁ֣וּ <sup>7493 </sup> <n>may shake</n> הַסִּפִּ֗ים <sup>5592 </sup> <n>that the posts</n> וּבְצַ֙עַם֙ <sup>1214 </sup> <n>and cut</n> בְּרֹ֣אשׁ <sup>7218 </sup> <n>them in the head</n> כֻּלָּ֔ם <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> וְאַחֲרִיתָ֖ם <sup>319 </sup> <n>the last</n> בַּחֶ֣רֶב <sup>2719 </sup> <n>of them with the sword</n> אֶהֱרֹ֑ג <sup>2026 </sup> <n>all of them and I will slay</n> לֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>have a</n> יָנ֤וּס <sup>5127 </sup> <n>he that fleeth</n> לָהֶם֙ נָ֔ס <sup>5127 </sup> <n>of them shall not flee away</n> וְלֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> יִמָּלֵ֥ט <sup>4422 </sup> <n>of them shall not be delivered</n> לָהֶ֖ם פָּלִֽיט׃ <sup>6412 </sup> <n>and he that escapeth</n>
2: אִם־ <sup>518 </sup> <n>Though</n> יַחְתְּר֣וּ <sup>2864 </sup> <n>Though they dig</n> בִשְׁא֔וֹל <sup>7585 </sup> <n>into hell</n> מִשָּׁ֖ם <sup>8033 </sup> <n>there</n> יָדִ֣י <sup>3027 </sup> <n>thence shall mine hand</n> תִקָּחֵ֑ם <sup>3947 </sup> <n>take</n> וְאִֽם־ <sup>518 </sup> <n>and though</n> יַעֲלוּ֙ <sup>5927 </sup> <n>them though they climb up</n> הַשָּׁמַ֔יִם <sup>8064 </sup> <n>to heaven</n> מִשָּׁ֖ם <sup>8033 </sup> <n>there</n> אוֹרִידֵֽם׃ <sup>3381 </sup> <n>thence will I bring them down</n>
3: וְאִם־ <sup>518 </sup> <n>Though</n> יֵחָֽבְאוּ֙ <sup>2244 </sup> <n>And though they hide</n> בְּרֹ֣אשׁ <sup>7218 </sup> <n>themselves in the top</n> הַכַּרְמֶ֔ל <sup>3760 </sup> <n>of Carmel</n> מִשָּׁ֥ם <sup>8033 </sup> <n>there</n> אֲחַפֵּ֖שׂ <sup>2664 </sup> <n>I will search</n> וּלְקַחְתִּ֑ים <sup>3947 </sup> <n>and take them out</n> וְאִם־ <sup>518 </sup> <n>and though</n> יִסָּ֨תְר֜וּ <sup>5641 </sup> <n>thence and though they be hid</n> מִנֶּ֤גֶד <sup>5048 </sup> <n>from</n> עֵינַי֙ <sup>5869 </sup> <n>from my sight</n> בְּקַרְקַ֣ע <sup>7172 </sup> <n>in the bottom</n> הַיָּ֔ם <sup>3220 </sup> <n>of the sea</n> מִשָּׁ֛ם <sup>8033 </sup> <n>there</n> אֲצַוֶּ֥ה <sup>6680 </sup> <n>thence will I command</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הַנָּחָ֖שׁ <sup>5175 </sup> <n>the serpent</n> וּנְשָׁכָֽם׃ <sup>5391 </sup> <n>and he shall bite</n>
4: וְאִם־ <sup>518 </sup> <n>and though</n> יֵלְכ֤וּ <sup>1980 </sup> <n>go</n> בַשְּׁבִי֙ <sup>7628 </sup> <n>into captivity</n> לִפְנֵ֣י <sup>6440 </sup> <n>before</n> אֹֽיבֵיהֶ֔ם <sup>341 </sup> <n>their enemies</n> מִשָּׁ֛ם <sup>8033 </sup> <n>there</n> אֲצַוֶּ֥ה <sup>6680 </sup> <n>thence will I command</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הַחֶ֖רֶב <sup>2719 </sup> <n>the sword</n> וַהֲרָגָ֑תַם <sup>2026 </sup> <n>and it shall slay</n> וְשַׂמְתִּ֨י <sup>7760 </sup> <n>them and I will set</n> עֵינִ֧י <sup>5869 </sup> <n>mine eyes</n> עֲלֵיהֶ֛ם <sup>5921 </sup> <n>against</n> לְרָעָ֖ה <sup>7451 </sup> <n>upon them for evil</n> וְלֹ֥א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>for</n> לְטוֹבָֽה׃ <sup>2896 </sup> <n>and not for good</n>
5: וַאדֹנָ֨י <sup>136 </sup> <n>And the Lord</n> יְהוִ֜ה <sup>3069 </sup> <n>GOD</n> הַצְּבָא֗וֹת <sup>6635 </sup> <n>of hosts</n> הַנּוֹגֵ֤עַ <sup>5060 </sup> <n>[is] he that toucheth</n> בָּאָ֙רֶץ֙ <sup>776 </sup> <n>the land</n> וַתָּמ֔וֹג <sup>4127 </sup> <n>and it shall melt</n> וְאָבְל֖וּ <sup>56 </sup> <n>therein shall mourn</n> כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>and all</n> י֣וֹשְׁבֵי <sup>3427 </sup> <n>and all that dwell</n> בָ֑הּ וְעָלְתָ֤ה <sup>5927 </sup> <n>and it shall rise up</n> כַיְאֹר֙ <sup>2975 </sup> <n>wholly like a flood</n> כֻּלָּ֔הּ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>and all</n> וְשָׁקְעָ֖ה <sup>8257 </sup> <n>and shall be drowned</n> כִּיאֹ֥ר <sup>2975 </sup> <n>as [by] the flood</n> מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <sup>4714 </sup> <n>of Egypt</n>
6: הַבּוֹנֶ֤ה <sup>1129 </sup> <n>[It is] he that buildeth</n> בַשָּׁמַ֙יִם֙ <sup>8064 </sup> <n>in the heaven</n> [מַעֲלֹותֹו כ] (מַעֲלֹותָ֔יו <sup>4609 </sup> <n>step</n> ק) וַאֲגֻדָּת֖וֹ <sup>92 </sup> <n>his troop</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>over</n> אֶ֣רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>in the earth</n> יְסָדָ֑הּ <sup>3245 </sup> <n>and hath founded</n> הַקֹּרֵ֣א <sup>7121 </sup> <n>he that calleth</n> לְמֵֽי־ <sup>4325 </sup> <n>for the waters</n> הַיָּ֗ם <sup>3220 </sup> <n>of the sea</n> וַֽיִּשְׁפְּכֵ֛ם <sup>8210 </sup> <n>and poureth them out</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>over</n> פְּנֵ֥י <sup>6440 </sup> <n>upon the face</n> הָאָ֖רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>of the earth</n> יְהוָ֥ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>The LORD</n> שְׁמֽוֹ׃ <sup>8034 </sup> <n>[is] his name</n>
7: הֲל֣וֹא <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> כִבְנֵי֩ <sup>1121 </sup> <n>[Are] ye not as children</n> כֻשִׁיִּ֨ים <sup>3569 </sup> <n>of the Ethiopians</n> אַתֶּ֥ם <sup>859 </sup> <n>you</n> לִ֛י בְּנֵ֥י <sup>1121 </sup> <n>unto me O children</n> יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>Israel</n> נְאֻם־ <sup>5002 </sup> <n>said</n> יְהוָ֑ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>the LORD</n> הֲל֣וֹא <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>Israel</n> הֶעֱלֵ֙יתִי֙ <sup>5927 </sup> <n>Have not I brought up</n> מֵאֶ֣רֶץ <sup>776 </sup> <n>out of the land</n> מִצְרַ֔יִם <sup>4714 </sup> <n>of Egypt</n> וּפְלִשְׁתִּיִּ֥ים <sup>6430 </sup> <n>and the Philistines</n> מִכַּפְתּ֖וֹר <sup>3731 </sup> <n>from Caphtor</n> וַאֲרָ֥ם <sup>758 </sup> <n>and the Syrians</n> מִקִּֽיר׃ <sup>7024 </sup> <n>Kir</n>
8: הִנֵּ֞ה <sup>2009 </sup> <n>Behold</n> עֵינֵ֣י ׀ <sup>5869 </sup> <n>Behold the eyes</n> אֲדֹנָ֣י <sup>136 </sup> <n>of the Lord</n> יְהוִ֗ה <sup>3069 </sup> <n>GOD</n> בַּמַּמְלָכָה֙ <sup>4467 </sup> <n>kingdom</n> הַֽחַטָּאָ֔ה <sup>2400 </sup> <n>the sinful</n> וְהִשְׁמַדְתִּ֣י <sup>8045 </sup> <n>and I will destroy</n> אֹתָ֔הּ <sup>853 </sup> מֵעַ֖ל <sup>5921 </sup> <n>from</n> פְּנֵ֣י <sup>6440 </sup> <n>it from off the face</n> הָאֲדָמָ֑ה <sup>127 </sup> <n>of the earth</n> אֶ֗פֶס <sup>657 </sup> <n>saving</n> כִּ֠י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> לֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>I will not</n> הַשְׁמֵ֥יד <sup>8045 </sup> <n>that I will not utterly</n> אַשְׁמִ֛יד <sup>8045 </sup> <n>destroy</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> בֵּ֥ית <sup>1004 </sup> <n>the house</n> יַעֲקֹ֖ב <sup>3290 </sup> <n>of Jacob</n> נְאֻם־ <sup>5002 </sup> <n>saith</n> יְהוָֽה׃ <sup>3068 </sup> <n>the LORD</n>
9: כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>For</n> הִנֵּ֤ה <sup>2009 </sup> <n>behold</n> אָֽנֹכִי֙ <sup>595 </sup> <n>I</n> מְצַוֶּ֔ה <sup>6680 </sup> <n>For lo I will command</n> וַהֲנִע֥וֹתִי <sup>5128 </sup> <n>and I will sift</n> בְכָֽל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>all</n> הַגּוֹיִ֖ם <sup>1471 </sup> <n>among all nations</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> בֵּ֣ית <sup>1004 </sup> <n>the house</n> יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>of Israel</n> כַּאֲשֶׁ֤ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>as</n> יִנּ֙וֹעַ֙ <sup>5128 </sup> <n>like as [corn] is sifted</n> בַּכְּבָרָ֔ה <sup>3531 </sup> <n>in a sieve</n> וְלֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> יִפּ֥וֹל <sup>5307 </sup> <n>fall</n> צְר֖וֹר <sup>6872 </sup> <n>yet shall not the least grain</n> אָֽרֶץ׃ <sup>776 </sup> <n>upon the earth</n>
10: בַּחֶ֣רֶב <sup>2719 </sup> <n>by the sword</n> יָמ֔וּתוּ <sup>4191 </sup> <n>shall die</n> כֹּ֖ל <sup>3605 </sup> <n>All</n> חַטָּאֵ֣י <sup>2400 </sup> <n>All the sinners</n> עַמִּ֑י <sup>5971 </sup> <n>of my people</n> הָאֹמְרִ֗ים <sup>559 </sup> <n>which say</n> לֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>will not</n> תַגִּ֧ישׁ <sup>5066 </sup> <n>shall not overtake</n> וְתַקְדִּ֛ים <sup>6923 </sup> <n>nor prevent</n> בַּעֲדֵ֖ינוּ <sup>5704 </sup> <n>against</n> הָרָעָֽה׃ <sup>7451 </sup> <n>The evil</n>
11: בַּיּ֣וֹם <sup>3117 </sup> <n>In that day</n> הַה֔וּא <sup>1931 </sup> <n>I</n> אָקִ֛ים <sup>6965 </sup> <n>will I raise up</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> סֻכַּ֥ת <sup>5521 </sup> <n>the tabernacle</n> דָּוִ֖יד <sup>1732 </sup> <n>of David</n> הַנֹּפֶ֑לֶת <sup>5307 </sup> <n>that is fallen</n> וְגָדַרְתִּ֣י <sup>1443 </sup> <n>and close up</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> פִּרְצֵיהֶ֗ן <sup>6556 </sup> <n>the breaches</n> וַהֲרִֽסֹתָיו֙ <sup>2034 </sup> <n>his ruins</n> אָקִ֔ים <sup>6965 </sup> <n>thereof and I will raise up</n> וּבְנִיתִ֖יהָ <sup>1129 </sup> <n>and I will build</n> כִּימֵ֥י <sup>3117 </sup> <n>it as in the days</n> עוֹלָֽם׃ <sup>5769 </sup> <n>of old</n>
12: לְמַ֨עַן <sup>4616 </sup> <n>because of</n> יִֽירְשׁ֜וּ <sup>3423 </sup> <n>That they may possess</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> שְׁאֵרִ֤ית <sup>7611 </sup> <n>the remnant</n> אֱדוֹם֙ <sup>123 </sup> <n>of Edom</n> וְכָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>and all</n> הַגּוֹיִ֔ם <sup>1471 </sup> <n>and of all the heathen</n> אֲשֶׁר־ <sup>834 </sup> <n>who</n> נִקְרָ֥א <sup>7121 </sup> <n>which are called</n> שְׁמִ֖י <sup>8034 </sup> <n>by my name</n> עֲלֵיהֶ֑ם <sup>5921 </sup> <n>and</n> נְאֻם־ <sup>5002 </sup> <n>saith</n> יְהוָ֖ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>the LORD</n> עֹ֥שֶׂה <sup>6213 </sup> <n>that doeth</n> זֹּֽאת׃ <sup>2063 </sup> <n>likewise</n> פ
13: הִנֵּ֨ה <sup>2009 </sup> <n>Behold</n> יָמִ֤ים <sup>3117 </sup> <n>Behold the days</n> בָּאִים֙ <sup>935 </sup> <n>come</n> נְאֻם־ <sup>5002 </sup> <n>saith</n> יְהוָ֔ה <sup>3068 </sup> <n>the LORD</n> וְנִגַּ֤שׁ <sup>5066 </sup> <n>shall overtake</n> חוֹרֵשׁ֙ <sup>2790 </sup> <n>that the plowman</n> בַּקֹּצֵ֔ר <sup>7114 </sup> <n>the reaper</n> וְדֹרֵ֥ךְ <sup>1869 </sup> <n>and the treader</n> עֲנָבִ֖ים <sup>6025 </sup> <n>of grapes</n> בְּמֹשֵׁ֣ךְ <sup>4900 </sup> <n>him that soweth</n> הַזָּ֑רַע <sup>2233 </sup> <n>seed</n> וְהִטִּ֤יפוּ <sup>5197 </sup> <n>shall drop</n> הֶֽהָרִים֙ <sup>2022 </sup> <n>and the mountains</n> עָסִ֔יס <sup>6071 </sup> <n>sweet wine</n> וְכָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>and all</n> הַגְּבָע֖וֹת <sup>1389 </sup> <n>and all the hills</n> תִּתְמוֹגַֽגְנָה׃ <sup>4127 </sup> <n>shall melt</n>
14: וְשַׁבְתִּי֮ <sup>7725 </sup> <n>And I will bring again</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> שְׁב֣וּת <sup>7622 </sup> <n>the captivity</n> עַמִּ֣י <sup>5971 </sup> <n>of my people</n> יִשְׂרָאֵל֒ <sup>3478 </sup> <n>of Israel</n> וּבָנ֞וּ <sup>1129 </sup> <n>and they shall build</n> עָרִ֤ים <sup>5892 </sup> <n>cities</n> נְשַׁמּוֹת֙ <sup>8074 </sup> <n>the waste</n> וְיָשָׁ֔בוּ <sup>3427 </sup> <n>and inhabit</n> וְנָטְע֣וּ <sup>5193 </sup> <n>[them] and they shall plant</n> כְרָמִ֔ים <sup>3754 </sup> <n>vineyards</n> וְשָׁת֖וּ <sup>8354 </sup> <n>and drink</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> יֵינָ֑ם <sup>3196 </sup> <n>the wine</n> וְעָשׂ֣וּ <sup>6213 </sup> <n>thereof they shall also make</n> גַנּ֔וֹת <sup>1593 </sup> <n>gardens</n> וְאָכְל֖וּ <sup>398 </sup> <n>and eat</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> פְּרִיהֶֽם׃ <sup>6529 </sup> <n>the fruit</n>
15: וּנְטַעְתִּ֖ים <sup>5193 </sup> <n>And I will plant</n> עַל־ <sup>5921 </sup> <n>on</n> אַדְמָתָ֑ם <sup>127 </sup> <n>them upon their land</n> וְלֹ֨א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> יִנָּתְשׁ֜וּ <sup>5428 </sup> <n>and they shall no more be pulled up</n> ע֗וֹד <sup>5750 </sup> <n>again</n> מֵעַ֤ל <sup>5921 </sup> <n>out</n> אַדְמָתָם֙ <sup>127 </sup> <n>out of their land</n> אֲשֶׁ֣ר <sup>834 </sup> <n>Which</n> נָתַ֣תִּי <sup>5414 </sup> <n>which I have given</n> לָהֶ֔ם <sup>1992 </sup> <n>them</n> אָמַ֖ר <sup>559 </sup> <n>them saith</n> יְהוָ֥ה <sup>3069 </sup> <n>God</n> אֱלֹהֶֽיךָ׃ <sup>430 </sup> <n>thy God</n>
